casebody.data:
Felicia PUGLIESE, Petitioner-Respondent,
v.
STATE-OPERATED SCHOOL DISTRICT OF THE CITY OF NEWARK, ESSEX COUNTY, Respondent-Petitioner. Edgard Chavez, Petitioner-Respondent,
v.
State-Operated School District of the City of Newark, Essex County, Respondent-Petitioner. C-131 September Term 2018
081300 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 11, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-3689/5527-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
